result.title: Communication and dissemination activities II
result.description: The deliverable will include the activities aimed at communicating and disseminating the findings of the project. These will include: (1) a catalogue of youth participatory practices in the EU, two Toolkits for promoting youth active citizenships, respectively, (2) in youth organizations and (3) in schools, two policy briefs for (4) national and (5) EU public authorities, (6) recommendations for media producers and media organizations and (7) a documentary. The catalogue will contain a list of youth organizations in the EU countries involved in the case studies.The toolkit for youth organizations will translate the project’s results into a simple, clear and youth-friendly form, enabling youth organizations to exploit the project’s results. The toolkit for teachers will translate the project’s results into guidelines for teachers, enabling them to exploit the project’s results in the schools’ curriculum. Policy briefs will provide suggestions to national and EU public authorities to exploit the project’s results. Recommendations for media producers and media organizations will aim to help them to exploit the project’s results. The documentary will illustrate and share main findings of the project on youth active citizenship in practice a documentary on the project to share main findings of the project with young people

project.title: Constructing AcTive CitizensHip with European Youth: Policies, Practices, Challenges and Solutions
